Diagnostic_Criteria: Positive Western Blot, MRI/CT with <20 viable cysts
Other_Demographics: History of seizures <10 years, no major comorbidities
Imaging_Schedule: MRI at baseline, day 180 and day 360
Seizure_Reduction_Percentage: Overall reduction in seizure days for Enhanced (144 Conventional vs. 31 Enhanced, p=0.007)
Other_AE: Insomnia, weight gain, increased glucose (no significant differences)
Comments: Enhanced regimen showed significant reduction in seizures during days 1-21 (p=0.014), with fewer adverse events and similar efficacy in cyst reduction. Overall results suggest enhanced steroid dosing can lower seizure incidence without impacting cyst resolution.
